+2 health regeneration per round of combat
+5 to minion HP per minion CR
Replace this mod with two mods

After you received damage for the first time in a combat, you become resistant to that damage type for the rest of the combat. You then become vulnerable to two other damage types (chosen randomly). TODO: Provide table
Gain temporary hit points equal to your lowest ability score (not bonus) at the beginning of each combat. This mod can stack.
+2 to loot rolls result, -1 loot roll die size
When you score a critical hit on a death saving throw, you gain 1 hit point and immediately end your turn
You have an additional first level spell slot
You have an additional second level spell slot
You have an additional spell slot of your second highest spell slot where you have at least one spell slot available
+5ft attack reach with melee attacks on your turn
When you score a critical strike with an attack of opportunity, the target is paralyzed until the end of their turn
+1 proficiency bonus if this mod is empowered or appears twice on the same item
When you hit a creature with an attack, they are silenced until the end of their next turn
-1 critical strike requirement with attacks (including spell attacks)
Targets have +1 critical strike avoidance minimum when saving against your spells
You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet
Stone's Endurance (if you already have it, you get another use per long/short rest) (Volo's p109)
First wearer chooses a language in which that this item grants perfect knowledge
+10 feet speed in all of your available speed types
+1 to hit die size for regaining health during short rests
+1 weapon attack AB with attacks that deal non-physical damage
You have advantage on initiative rolls
+10ft swimming speed, and you can breath under water
You can jump without a run-up as if you had taken a run-up
+5 points of Lay on Hands per long rest

+4 damage against creatures of a certain type 
		(random, 1-14, [1 Abberation, 2 Beast, 3 Celestial, 4 Construct, 5 Dragon, 6 Elemental, 7 Fey, 8 Fiend, 9 Giant, 10 Humanoid, 11 Monstrosity, 12 Ooze, 13 Plant, 14 Undead]

When you go down to 0 hit points, creatures of your choice within 5 feet of you must succeed a Constitution save against a DC of (8 + prof + attribute mod of your choice) or be stunned until the end of your next turn
Your short rests can be 10 minutes shorter, to a minimum of 20 minutes
Your long rests can be 1 hour shorter, to a minimum of 3 hours
You need four failed death save points to die, instead of 3
+20 feet to both range options on ranged weapons. This does nothing on weapons without range
Randomise a cantrip. While wearing this item, you may cast that cantrip once per long rest. Spellcasting modifier can be a mental attribute of your choice.
+2 to deception in languages other than Common
You gain telepathy with a range of 10 feet
While wearing this item, you gain sustenance every 24 hours
This item sells for an extra 1d100 gold. You only roll after the item is sold
Modifiers to your damage apply to your minions at 50% effectiveness (stacks, max 100%)

Whenever you deal damage, you may choose to instead not deal damage, and the enemy will provide you with an additional loot roll on death, with die size equal to one fifth of the damage nullified. 
			If the number is odd, your minimum result increases by 1. A creature cannot provide more than one such loot roll.
When you are hit by a melee attack, you may use a reaction to disengage and take a normal movement action
This item's maximum number of mods is increased by 2. This mod cannot appear twice or be empowered.
+1 AC while unarmoured (does not work while using a shield)
Once per long rest, when rolling a natural 1 on a d20, you may reroll.
+1 to this weapon's base damage die size
Heal 1 HP on striking with this weapon in combat
When you take damage from a melee or touch attack, the attacker takes true damage equal to your level
When a melee or touch fails to hit you, the attacker takes true damage equal to half your level (rounded up)
+1 to saving throws made to end an ongoing condition if your HP is above 0
When you score a critical strike, recover a 1st-level spell slot
When you score a critical strike, recover a 10% of your maximum class points (minimum 1)
Recover a 1st-level spell slot when you roll for initiative
Recover 10% of your maximum class points (minimum 1) when you roll for initiative
Roll again, making that result a negative enchant. Then roll again, empowering that result.
You have resistance to all damage while taking the Dodge action
Your critical strikes add 1 additional damage die from the source's base damage
Reduce the damage bonus of incoming damage you are vulnerable to by 25%
-1 to a creature's saving throws attempting to end an ongoing condition you caused
This weapon is considered magical for the purposes of overcoming resistances and immunities
